name: Lava Monster
description: They probably don't ever get cold.

actionResponse.look: They probably don't ever get cold.

name: Vine Monster
description: How many vines does it have? Too many to count.

actionResponse.look: How many vines does it have? Too many to count.

name: Ice Monster
description: They look like they could freeze you solid.

actionResponse.look: They look like they could freeze you solid.

name: Swamp Monster
description: You see the monster's eyes peeking out from the swamp.

actionResponse.look: You see the monster's eyes peeking out from the swamp water.

name: Sand Monster
description: It's hard to tell where the sand starts and the sand monster ends.

actionResponse.look: It's hard to tell where the sand starts and the sand monster ends.
